EmailTemplate.name: 2019BK-01 RDR 2060 Weather Radar Upgrade Program EXTERNAL..2019BK-01 RDR 2060 We
EmailTemplate.subject: 2019 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | December 2018
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here are this week's Sales Bulletins:
Dealer and Operator Sales Bulletins:
RDR 2060 Weather Radar and Upgrade Program BendixKing is pleased to announce the upgrade of your RDR 2000 Weather Radar with the features and power of the RDR 2100 with Dealer Bulletin 2019BK-01 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019BK-01 Rev A RDR 2060 Weather Radar Upgrade Program.pdf]]> and Operator Bulletin 2019BK_O_01 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019BK_O_01 RDR 2060 Weather Radar Upgrade Program.pdf]]>.
The complete list of 2018 Sales Bulletins is available at MyAerospace/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
